thread.title: What's the Worst Thing That Can Happen as an Entrepreneur?
thread.title_full: What's the Worst Thing That Can Happen as an Entrepreneur?

author: Jason Saltzman
title: What's the Worst Thing That Can Happen as an Entrepreneur?
text:
What's the Worst Thing That Can Happen as an Entrepreneur? Two successful entrepreneurs talk about their worst days in business. Startup Mentor, Entrepreneur, CEO of Alley   
On this episode of Resilience , Entrepreneur Network partner Jason Saltzman sits down with Cesar Kuriyama, founder of the 1 Second Everyday app, and Jean-Sébastien Gosuin, co-founder and CEO of Seaters Inc., to talk about the worst moments in their professional careers. Kuriyama explains how one company tried to steal his idea, while Gosuin breaks down the pain of having to close his first company. 
Watch the video to learn more and catch the full episodes here . 
Related: How to Break the Rules of the Internet to Create a Strategic Advantage 
Entrepreneur Network is a premium video network providing entertainment, education and inspiration from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders. We provide expertise and opportunities to accelerate brand growth and effectively monetize video and audio content distributed across all digital platforms for the business genre. 
EN is partnered with hundreds of top YouTube channels in the business vertical and provides partners with distribution on Entrepreneur.com as well as our apps on Amazon Fire , Roku and Apple TV . 
Click here to become a part of this growing video network. Jason Saltzman Jason Saltzman is a seasoned entrepreneur with a background in sales and marketing.
